name: Point Zero Knight
description:
My entry for Gogodot jam 2, theme : Energy source

Tldr : 

Each level has locked doors, you must find batteries and charge them to open these doors,  fight the enemies along the way, and reach the exit, you can use your sword, jump and walljump off a single wall. (Fullscreen option is available)

Story (sorta...) :

On a distant planet, an experiment in nano technology gone wrong has set loose an army of dangerous robots, it has been years and most cities have been evacuated, not all is lost however, a small group of resistance formed to fight back and salvaged a few prototype power armors and energy blades to stand a fighting chance against the bots and regain control, you (the player) are one of them. 

You must navigate among the deserted city, security doors have been shut close and in order to progress must be opened by manual override of their backup generetor, these backups use batteries. You should be able to find a few out there, however you'll need to locate an energy source to charge them. 

Good Luck ! 

Controls (controller recommended for best experience) :

Keyboard :

Arrowkeys = Move L/R

X = Attack

C = Jump (Note : you can wall jump from a single wall megaman style)

Controller :

Dpad = Move L/R

X = Attack

A = Jump (Note : you can wall jump from a single wall megaman style)

Credits :

All code, visual assets, music, and sfx, done solo during the jam's time.

Programs used :

Godot engine 3.3.1, Blender 2.93, Gimp 2.10, LMMS and Sfxr internal plugin.

External sources :

Oxanium font from Google fonts, Gogodot jam's Logo for the splashscreen and cover (in case i can't use the logo in that way, please tell me and i will make all the necessary changes )

Thats about it, hope you'll enjoy the game and have fun :)
